events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit well and I am unhappy with the purchase.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry based on their message mentioning a return and dissatisfaction.
Assigning the refund case to Refund Specialist Julia for further handling and resolution.
